org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement

Class InvalidateBlocks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.InvalidateBlocks

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 class InvalidateBlocks
extends Object
    Keeps a Collection for every named machine containing blocks that have recently been invalidated and are thought to live on the machine in question.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int blockInvalidateLimit 
      private Map<DatanodeInfo,LightWeightHashSet<Block>> node2blocks
      Mapping: DatanodeInfo -> Collection of Blocks
      private long numBlocks
      The total number of blocks in the map.
      private long pendingPeriodInMs
      The period of pending time for block invalidation since the NameNode startup
      private long startupTime
      the startup time

      • numBlocks

        long numBlocks()
        Returns:
        the number of blocks to be invalidated .

      • contains

        boolean contains(DatanodeInfo dn,
               Block block)
        Returns:
        true if the given storage has the given block listed for invalidation. Blocks are compared including their generation stamps: if a block is pending invalidation but with a different generation stamp, returns false.
